title: Big Plays Spotlight: LeBlanc’s Dangerous Game

replies.body:
No one saw the {{champion:412}} 
 plays??? only made possible by him <3
ya i think so, thresh made some true plays
Everyone forgets the supports except when they miss skill shots or their wards expire.{{champion:412}}

Then the ADC's go "OMG WARD YOU *****" "WTF" "**** YOU"

The joys of being a support
It isn't one of the most glamorous roles, but it's one of the most self-gratifying. When your adc dominates the game, you're just like, "I helped do that." Almost makes you wanna cry... {{item:3151}}

I used to main {{champion:412}}  and almost always manage my adc to dominate the game. The feeling is great also for when you pull off some pretty epic saves and have someone say "I love this Thresh." It rarely happens when someone says it, but it's always worth it. #supportpride

I was playing Braum with a person that was new to Varus, near end game I saved him from a Kha'zix/Volibear gank and the Kha said "Does Braum at least get a thank you?" and Varus said "Braum is my dad."(I am not his dad, that would be weird since I am 16) That made my day :D
THen I need you on my side sir. I always compliment and give credit where it's due. Most of the time, it's the support that allows me to jump ahead.
i also play thresh it feels awesome when some one say "this thresh is awesome" or "nerf this thresh to OP"
You know they actually mentioned thresh in the description right?
then why isn't it called "Big Plays Spotlight: LeBlanc + Thresh's Dangerous Game" QQ

There's a character limit for the headline :D

Also, "dangerous game" has a double meaning for LeBlanc in this particular instance
I think you are Preeti. <3

Because it wasn't the thresh's initial decision to make the plays to kill the enemies, if you look at the thresh's direction, he wanted to run away, to avoid a fight. But it was LeBlanc's crazy idea to go and initiate a 2v4

There was no 2 v 4 :/ They worked together to divided and made the numbers even while they keep going one at a time at her. 

 Thresh lanterned her to safety, led them away so she 'could' jumped on Morg(killing both her and almost dead rumble) he gave her armor to take on Warwick and then chased after Nami while her cool downs ran out. LB couldn't do any of that with out him. Doesn't mater 'if' she wanted to fight, she was dead with out him from the start. He was what was need for it to work.
LB was only able to do anything because of 'his' plays.
She was the AP he was the defense.
Playing support is like being a SysAdmin or Ops Manager.. no one notices you when you do your job right, but when things go south EVERYONE has a piece of advice for you!

If you do your job right

nobody will be sure you did anything at all
support is like an offensive linemen lol.. nobody cares about them unless they miss a block
These {{champion:412}} plays really hook me..... no? okay.

ok i am going to stomp this now. support can get kills people all champion are meant to be able to play all lanes, there for being a support doesn't meant you have to steal all their but most of u will disagree anyways because all of you are kill greedy
I think he is trying to communicate
What does it mean?
i was already logged in so i upvoted this
Real Men say, "If you have more than one hp, you are ready to go!"

When men make fairy tail references, I hear them like a man
~Elf man
You sir have an amazing parfum...
I'm all fired up!
Aye Sir!
Real men need no more than 1 hp.
Tryndamere {{champion:23}}
{{champion:64}} The handicapped man says "I have my w up? Lets Go!"
A BUNCH OF LITLE NATSU S EVERYWHERE HAAHAHHA          {{champion:102}}

I love how everyone is saying Thresh made this possible.
Lets be real here, it wouldn't be possible without both of them and good teamwork.
Pretty freaking pro XD
I wonder if bjergsen could pull something off like this..
Yes, I can
lmao do it for me bjerg <3 miss your stream!!! Beeen soooo long since iver seen you on
Bjergsens real ign is Bjerg. This is an imposter
Funny how you are not the real Bjergsen... Shame

koreans...
simply as that {{summoner:13}}
{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} as fast as you can, you can't catch me, I'm the eqivalent of the gingerbread man.{{champion:7}}
I think I just found my new Senpai...
Plot Twist: Faker's alt account

Looks Like it doesnt it, lol




{{champion:7}} needs to not be nerfed lol
Take what u said back about nerfing leblanc before riot see that post ;-;
evryone thinks this was all {{champion:7}} but this was all {{champion:412}} all the {{champion:7}} did was take the kill and be thirsty
lb should have taken the kill... she's a carry, thresh is a support. they both did very well.
If i was purple team, I'd be kinda mad that just happened. Great plays on both thresh and Leblanc though, the crucible and lantern saved her life 3x :o.
Thresh did all the work {{item:3040}} {{champion:412}}
report nami for not being as good as thresh D:
